Location
: Ho Chi Minh
 OBJECTIVES
With experiences gained from 5 years working as a
Content Product Manager for a Web-Mobile Product, I
have then been involved in some important parts of
product development like research, problem
identification, manage content, and testing for my
previous company’s product.
My goal is to do well within my ability and to become
the connection between all the teams, the products,
and users. I believe only when I do something I really
have passion in and is capable of, I will do my best.
 SKILLS
CMS Tools
Problems Solving
Team Work
Tech Knowledge
Microsoft Excel
 LANGUAGES
English
 EXPERIENCE
Year(s) of Experience: 7
Current Level: Team Leader / Supervisor
4/2017 - Now : Freelance Translator - Team Leader - Klook
- Localize travel activities (tours, travel pass, 4G SIM, atraction's ticket...) on Klook
website/application 
- Manage and assign activities to junior translators to translate 
- Proofread translations 
- Test and feedback for new features in Application / CMS Tool
6/2016 - 8/2017 : Customer Service Rep - NCT Corp
- Handle user feedbacks from multiple platforms: Website/Wapsite, Mobile Application (Android,
iOS) 
- Work with several teams (Product Web, Product Mobile, Technical...) to determine and solve user
problems and product bugs 
- Handle payment problems for user
10/2015 - 5/2016 : Mobile Product Executive - NCT Corp
- Work directly with Mobile Developer to improve UX and features of NhacCuaTui mobile app 
- Handle user feedbacks from Google Play Store
4/2013 - 9/2015 : Content Product Manager - NCT Corp
- Manage content on NhacCuaTui Homepage: Banner, Top Videos 
- Upload, create and manage content in NhacCuaTui Database: Songs, Playlists, Video
3/2012 - 3/2013 : Outsource Staff - Adeco
- Outsource for Baidu Online Music Application 
- Create karaoke lyric for songs in Baidu Database 
- Create playlist for PC Application
Completion date 10-2010
No degree - Open University
Business Administrator. 
Dropped out of University after 3 years as majoring didn't fit with personality.
 EDUCATION
Highest Degree Level: Bachelor
- Nominated for "Top People 2016" at NCT Corp
- Acknowledged as one of the best outsource-staff of Klook
